comment: проповедница human female - стоит перед статуей, читает молитву пастве, стоящей перед ней на коленях (3-4 человека)

languages.text: "Славьте имя {name} фон Валанциус, что есть помазанни{mf|к|ца} Его, обративш{mf|ий|ая} сий приют порока в обитель веры, коим он и замышлялся издревле!"

traits.locale_text: "Славьте имя помазанни{mf|ка|цы} Его, {name} фон Валанциус, что обратил{mf||а} сий приют порока в обитель веры, коим он и замышлялся издревле!"

languages.text: "Glory to the name of {name} von Valancius, His anointed one who has turned this den of iniquity into the abode of faith its ancient founders always meant it to be!"
languages.original_text: "Славьте имя {name} фон Валанциус, что есть помазанни{mf|к|ца} Его, обративш{mf|ий|ая} сий приют порока в обитель веры, коим он и замышлялся издревле!"

traits.locale_text: "Glorify the name of {name} von Valancius, His anointed one who has turned this den of iniquity into the abode of faith its ancient founders always meant it to be!"
"Glorify the name of {name} von Valancius, His anointed one who has turned this den of iniquity into the abode of faith its ancient founders always meant it to be!"
"Glory to the name of {name} von Valancius, His anointed one who has turned this den of iniquity into the abode of faith its ancient founders always meant it to be!"
"Glory to the name of {name} von Valancius, His anointed one who has turned this den of iniquity into the abode of faith its ancient founders always meant it to be!"
"Glory to the name of {name} von Valancius, His anointed one who has turned this den of iniquity into the abode of faith its ancient founders always meant it to be!"
"Glory to the name of {name} von Valancius, His anointed one who has turned this den of iniquity into the abode of faith its ancient founders always meant it to be!"

languages.text: “荣耀归于帝皇的受膏者，{name}·冯·瓦兰修斯！在那位大人的指引下，这座罪恶的巢穴，变成了它的建造者所期待的信仰圣地！”
languages.original_text: "Glory to the name of {name} von Valancius, His anointed one who has turned this den of iniquity into the abode of faith its ancient founders always meant it to be!"

traits.locale_text: “荣耀归于帝皇的受膏者，{name}·冯·瓦兰修斯！在那位大人的指引下，这座罪恶的巢穴，变成了它的建造者所期待的信仰圣地！”

languages.text: 「{name}・フォン・ヴァランシウスの御名に栄光あれ。聖なるお方は、この不義な場所を信念の地へと変えてくださった。そう、古の創始者たちが望んでいた世界のように！」
languages.original_text: "Glory to the name of {name} von Valancius, His anointed one who has turned this den of iniquity into the abode of faith its ancient founders always meant it to be!"

traits.locale_text: 「{name}・フォン・ヴァランシウスの御名に栄光あれ。聖なるお方は、この不義な場所を信念の地へと変えてくださった。そう、古の創始者たちが望んでいた世界のように！」

languages.text: «¡Gloria a {name} von Valancius, que ha convertido esta guarida de maldad en la morada de fe que sus antiguos fundadores siempre quisieron que fuera!».
languages.original_text: "Glory to the name of {name} von Valancius, His anointed one who has turned this den of iniquity into the abode of faith its ancient founders always meant it to be!"

traits.locale_text: «¡Gloria a {name} von Valancius, que ha convertido esta guarida de maldad en la morada de fe que sus antiguos fundadores siempre quisieron que fuera!».

languages.text: "Ruhm sei dem Namen {name} von Valancius {mf|seinem Gesalbten, der|seiner Gesalbten, die} diesen Sündenpfuhl in den Hort seines Glaubens verwandelt hat, den die Gründer vor langer Zeit im Sinn hatten!"
languages.original_text: "Glory to the name of {name} von Valancius, His anointed one who has turned this den of iniquity into the abode of faith its ancient founders always meant it to be!"

traits.locale_text: "Ruhm sei dem Namen {name} von Valancius {mf|seinem Gesalbten, der|seiner Gesalbten, die} diesen Sündenpfuhl in den Hort seines Glaubens verwandelt hat, den die Gründer vor langer Zeit im Sinn hatten!"

languages.text: « Gloire à {name} von Valancius, Son {mf|élu|élue} qui a exaucé les vœux des fondateurs de Castel en faisant de cet antre d'iniquité un véritable sanctuaire de la foi ! »
languages.original_text: "Glory to the name of {name} von Valancius, His anointed one who has turned this den of iniquity into the abode of faith its ancient founders always meant it to be!"

traits.locale_text: « Gloire à {name} von Valancius, Son {mf|élu|élue} qui a exaucé les vœux des fondateurs de Castel en faisant de cet antre d'iniquité un véritable sanctuaire de la foi ! »

languages.text: "{name} von Valancius ismi arşa değsin! O'nun kutsanmışı, bu günah yuvasını bir inanç abidesine dönüştürdü! Tam da kadim kurucularının arzuladığı gibi!"
languages.original_text: "Glory to the name of {name} von Valancius, His anointed one who has turned this den of iniquity into the abode of faith its ancient founders always meant it to be!"

traits.locale_text: "{name} von Valancius ismi arşa değsin! O'nun kutsanmışı, bu günah yuvasını bir inanç abidesine dönüştürdü! Tam da kadim kurucularının arzuladığı gibi!"
